features: [Unparalleled Expandability] – Leaplumin HY-A1 Phone Tripod Mount offers unparalleled expandability by providing 4 1/4 inch screws to connect magic arms and 2 cold shoes to attach LED light panels or microphones.
[Arca Swiss Quick Release Base] – The Arca Swiss rail enables quick mount and release of the camera tripod.
[Sliding Cold Shoe] – The sliding cold shoe on the top allows you to easily adjust the length without interfering with the attached kits.
[Full Aluminum Alloy Design] – Made with premium Aluminum Alloy to provide incomparable durability for daily use. The screw-locking design offers a much more secure grip than the spring clamp.

[Universal Compatibility] – Extendable length from 2.2 inches to 3.7 inches, the cell phone mount is compatible with most smartphones including iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, Sony Xperia, OnePlus, Moto, Xiaomi, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Leaplumin HY-A1 Universal Phone Tripod Mount Leaplumin HY-A1 offers 4 1/4 inch screw holes and 2 cold shoes allowing you to explore the endless possibilities in video shooting. And the versatile mounting interface lets you easily mount this phone clamp on the camera tripods, desktop tripods, or even camera handles, which makes it perfect for professional photography, live streaming gaming sessions, hosting a podcast, conducting virtual meeting, or creating vlogs.Dual Cold Shoe Design4 1/4 Inch ScrewsSliding Cold ShoeArca Swiss RailARRI Locating HolesLevelerFull Aluminum Alloy Body

Multi-Platform It also has Arca Swiss rails, 1/4” thread, and ARRI locating holes.Arca Swiss Rails: For Arca Swiss compatible mounts, such as tripods or gimbal stabilizers, for seamless integration into your photography gear.1/4” Thread: The phone holder can be easily attached to any standard tripod mount, providing stability and versatility for your photography or videography projects.ARRI Locating Holes: Allow you to attach ARRI-compatible handles, and grips to further customize your setup and enhance your content creation capabilities.

Unparalleled Expandability 4x 1/4 Inch Screws: Easy to connect magic arms or mount on the tripod in either vertical or horizontal position.2x 2 Cold Shoes: Effortlessly attach accessories such as microphones, lights, or other cold shoe-compatible kits to enhance your content creation.
Sliding Cold Shoe Patented sliding cold shoe design to avoid interference between screw knob and attached kits.

360°Phone Holder Ipad Mount for Tripod Tripod Ball Head Ball Head with 2 Cold Shoe Model HY-B1 HY-C1 HY-D1 HY-D2 HY-D7 Material Aluminum Alloy Aluminum Alloy Aluminum Alloy Aluminum Alloy Aluminum Alloy Color Black Gray Black Black Black Product Weight 0.46lb 0.4lb 0.2lb 0.2lb 0.26lb Max Load / / / 6.6lb 6.6lb

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and valuable
reviews.reviewText: I like the quality, appearance, size and stability of the camera support. It's well made, solid, and crafted with precision. I appreciate the beautifully finished complex machining, which makes it feel nice in the hand. It fits my phone well and it slides perfectly into their tripod's quick release slot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is very durable; high quality 👍🏽
reviews.reviewText: Smooth operating and simplistic design, yet for how simple it is, it’s got a fair amount of attachment options.I appreciate how strong this is. I can tell it’ll last a long time, perhaps forever.I like that I can keep my case on my iPhone, and I also keep this on it for most of the day. It’s not too big, and I keep my phone in my murse (man purse/small backpack…) or if I’ve got a large pocket.Then I can just put down my iPhone level on any flat surface to record, for spontaneous moments where I don’t have any equipment on me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy Duty and Small, Great device!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is exactly what I was looking for to be able to use my Samsung S23 Ultra with my Manfrotto tripod setup. I tried other phone holders but they were either to small to hold my S23 Ultra or they were made of cheap plastic. This Phone Tripod Mount is all Aluminum and built like a tank, yet it is small enough to put in a pocket. It adjusts very fast with the turn knob which is great. Nice quality rubber on the phone gripping edges and where your phone back will sit against. Has several places that accessories could be mounted and a Bubble level on top. You are not gonna break this thing even if your tripod crashes to the ground. Absolutely recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, specially for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Very solidly made. All metal. Feels nice in the hand like professional grade photography equipment from the 1980s. Great for home webcasting. A little bit on the heavy side, but also, you can throw into your bag loose and probably not worry about it breaking under an any normal circumstances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well designed and well made holder.
reviews.reviewText: The holder is made out of aluminum with very good precision machining. It feels solid and hold phones securely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phone adapter for tripods - PERFECT!
reviews.reviewText: 1. SOLID - If you're tired of "machined plastic" items that break, get ready to smile! This *GEM* looks, feels & works perfectly. It's made with precision, & is *ALL METAL*, aside from a knob & rubber affixed to the phone mount surface. Wait until you adjust the thumbscrew to fit your phone! You won't believe the precise feel of the mechanism's three sliding rods. It's apparent that this was designed & built by talented people who care.2. STURDY - Granted, much depends on the tripod, but if you've been stuck using spring-loaded, plastic, selfy-stick adapters previously, you'll be very pleased with the *ROCK SOLID* attachment to your tripod of this adapter.3. FEATURES ->Standard, ¼" x 20 tpi mounting holes, top, bottom & two on it's back.>Cold shoe slide mount.>Rail mount.>Bubble level.4. VALUE - Can I give it a six?5. OVERALL - This little, but important, accessory is so nicely made, & such a great pleasure to use, it actually made me smile - I had to show my wife that not everything today is made like c*ap. This will be around longer than I will. I happily put it on my all-metal tripod I've owned for 55 years - Perfect for each other, (and for me).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure phone clamp - sized right
reviews.reviewText: This holds my iPhone 15 Pro Max securely, has a cold shoe mount at each end and several 1/4in threaded inserts. It feels very sturdy and is no bigger than it has to be to get the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elite tier quality products
reviews.reviewText: The workmanship and finish is absolutely bonkers for the price.. this and the ball mount I purchased are a tactile and functional pleasure to use. I use it daily - pair it with another brand's aesthetic design-driven magic arm crab claw (they complement each other well) to attach to my desk, shelf, etc.I'm genuinely grateful to be able to afford this and the ball mount I also purchased. I would expect to pay much more to get close to this exceptional quality and apparent dedication to maximizing utility. I very very rarely write reviews but I'm inspired to when I handle this. Kudos to Leaplumin, thank you!
Solid build with screw tight adjustable pressure level

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Leaplumin Aluminum Phone Mount for Tripod, and I must say I'm thoroughly impressed. The build quality of this accessory is outstanding and truly high-end. It's evident that Leaplumin has put a lot of thought and care into crafting this phone mount.The use of aluminium not only adds to the overall sturdiness but also gives it a sleek and premium look. It complements my tripod perfectly and ensures that my phone is securely held in place.What I appreciate most about this phone mount is its versatility. It accommodates a wide range of phone sizes, making it compatible with my current and future devices. The adjustable design allows for both portrait and landscape orientation, offering me the flexibility I need for various photography and video recording purposes.The mount securely holds my phone in place, preventing any wobbling or slipping during use. I can confidently trust my valuable smartphone to this accessory without worrying about accidental drops.The ease of installation and the compatibility with standard tripod mounts are additional advantages. It's a breeze to attach to my tripod, making my photography and videography sessions more enjoyable and professional.Overall, the Leaplumin Aluminum Phone Mount for Tripod has exceeded my expectations. It's an investment in quality and convenience that I wholeheartedly recommend to fellow photographers, vloggers, and anyone looking to elevate their mobile photography game. It's a small accessory that makes a big difference.I'm extremely pleased with my purchase, and I can't recommend this product enough. Leaplumin has created a premium, well-built phone mount that's made a significant difference in my photography and video recording experience. It's definitely worth every penny.
